00042 void clSurfaceGrid::CreateUnstructured(clSurface *surface, const int numU, const int numV, const enDistributionType distributionType)
00043 {
00044   try
00045   {
00046     // Create a distribution
00047     dMatrix nodesU;
00048     dMatrix nodesV;
00049     Distribute(distributionType, numU, numV, nodesU, nodesV);
00050 
00051     // Create a 2d grid + initial grid
00052     clUnstructured2D unstructured2d;
00053     for(int v=0; v<numV; v++)
00054     {
00055       for(int u=0; u<numU; u++)
00056       {
00057         // Create a new node
00058         clNode2D *lastNode   = unstructured2d.GetNodePointer(unstructured2d.GetNumberNodes()-1);
00059         int       lastNodeID = lastNode->GetNumberID();
00060 
00061         clNode2D  newNode(lastNodeID+1, nodesU(u+1,1), nodesV(v+1,1));
00062 
00063         if(v==0 || v==numV-1 || u==0 || u==numU-1)
00064         {
00065           newNode.SetProtection();
00066         }
00067 
00068         unstructured2d.InsertNode(newNode);
00069       }
00070     }
00071 
00072     // Delete intial grid
00073     unstructured2d.DeleteInitialGrid();
00074 
00075     // Smooth the grid
00076     unstructured2d.DumpGrid("1");
00077     unstructured2d.Smooth();
00078 
00079     // Correct the grid
00080     unstructured2d.DumpGrid("2");
00081 //    unstructured2d.CorrectGrid();
00082     unstructured2d.DumpGrid("3");
00083 
00084     // Check the grid
00085     unstructured2d.CheckGrid();
00086 
00087     // Create 3D parametric grid
00088     StitchGrid(surface, &unstructured2d);
00089   }
00090 
00091   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00092   {
00093     EX.AddMethodToTree("clSurfaceGrid::CreateUnstructured");
00094     throw EX;
00095   }
00096 }

00098 void clSurfaceGrid::CreateUnstructured(clGeometry *geometry, const int numU, const int numV, const enDistributionType distributionType)
00099 {
00100   try
00101   {
00102     int numberSurfaces = geometry->GetNumberSurfaces();
00103     for(int s=0; s<numberSurfaces; s++)
00104     {
00105       clSurface *surface = geometry->GetSurfacePointer(s);
00106       CreateUnstructured(surface, numU, numV, distributionType);
00107     }
00108   }
00109 
00110   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00111   {
00112     EX.AddMethodToTree("clSurfaceGrid::CreateUnstructured");
00113     throw EX;
00114   }
00115 }

00117 void clSurfaceGrid::Distribute(const enDistributionType dType, const int numU, const int numV, dMatrix &nodesU, dMatrix &nodesV) const
00118 {
00119   nodesU.SetNumberRows(numU);
00120   nodesU.SetNumberColumns(1);
00121 
00122   nodesV.SetNumberRows(numV);
00123   nodesV.SetNumberColumns(1);
00124 
00125   if(dType==dtUniform)
00126   {
00127     // Distribution in U
00128     double deltaU = 1.0/(numU-1);
00129 
00130     for(int r=1; r<=numU; r++)
00131     {
00132       nodesU.SetElement(r, 1, (r-1)*deltaU);
00133     }
00134 
00135     // Distribution in V
00136     double deltaV = 1.0/(numV-1);
00137 
00138     {
00139       for(int r=1; r<=numV; r++)
00140       {
00141         nodesV.SetElement(r, 1, (r-1)*deltaV);
00142       }
00143     }
00144   }
00145   else if(dType==dtNonUniform)
00146   {
00147     double mu    = 0.5;
00148     double sigma = 0.95/4;
00149 
00150     // Create a normal distribution in U
00151     double totalDeltaU = 0.0;
00152     double deltaU[numU];
00153 
00154     deltaU[0] = 0.0;
00155     for(int r=1; r<numU; r++)
00156     {
00157       double u      = (double)(r)/(double)(numU-1);
00158       double factor = (double)(1)/(sigma*sqrt(2*PI));
00159       double num    = -pow(u-mu,2);
00160       double den    = 2*pow(sigma,2);
00161 
00162       deltaU[r]     = pow(2*factor, num/den);
00163       totalDeltaU  += deltaU[r];
00164     }
00165 
00166     // Correct and fill nodesU
00167     nodesU.SetElement(1, 1, 0.0);
00168     {
00169       for(int r=1; r<numU; r++)
00170       {
00171         nodesU.SetElement(r+1, 1, nodesU(r, 1)+deltaU[r]/totalDeltaU);
00172       }
00173     }
00174 
00175     // Create a normal distribution in V
00176     double totalDeltaV = 0.0;
00177     double deltaV[numV];
00178 
00179     deltaV[0] = 0.0;
00180     {
00181       for(int r=1; r<numV; r++)
00182       {
00183         double v      = (double)(r)/(double)(numV-1);
00184         double factor = (double)(1)/(sigma*sqrt(2*PI));
00185         double num    = -pow(v-mu,2);
00186         double den    = 2*pow(sigma,2);
00187 
00188         deltaV[r]     = pow(2*factor, num/den);
00189         totalDeltaV  += deltaV[r];
00190       }
00191     }
00192 
00193     // Correct and fill nodesV
00194     nodesV.SetElement(1, 1, 0.0);
00195     {
00196       for(int r=1; r<numV; r++)
00197       {
00198         nodesV.SetElement(r+1, 1, nodesV(r, 1)+deltaV[r]/totalDeltaV);
00199       }
00200     }
00201   }
00202   else if(dType==dtUserDefined)
00203   {
00204     throw clException("clSurfaceGrid", "Distribute", "DistributionType set to UserDefined: Invalid call to method Distribute.");
00205   }
00206   else
00207   {
00208     throw clException("clSurfaceGrid", "Distribute", "Unknown DistributionType.");
00209   }
00210 }

00212 void clSurfaceGrid::StitchGrid(clSurface *surface, clUnstructured2D *unstructured2d)
00213 {
00214   try
00215   {
00216     Copy2dGrid(surface, unstructured2d);
00217     DeleteDuplicateNodes();
00218 
00219     //TODO: Update neighbourReferences of elements: unstructuredGrid_1 elements to point to unstructuredGrid_2 elements and vice versa
00220   }
00221 
00222   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00223   {
00224     EX.AddMethodToTree("clSurfaceGrid::StitchGrids");
00225     throw EX;
00226   }
00227 }

00229 void clSurfaceGrid::Copy2dGrid(clSurface *surface, clUnstructured2D *unstructured2d)
00230 {
00231   try
00232   {
00233     // Copy nodes to surface grid, and update nodeIDs on the fly to ensure uniqueness
00234     int lastNodeID     = 0;
00235     int numberNodes    = GetNumberNodes();
00236     if(numberNodes>0)
00237     {
00238       clNode3D *node3d = GetNodePointer(numberNodes-1);
00239       lastNodeID = node3d->GetNumberID();
00240     }
00241 
00242     int lastElementID  = 0;
00243     int numberElements = GetNumberElements();
00244     if(numberElements>0)
00245     {
00246       clTriangle *element = GetElementPointer(numberElements-1);
00247       lastElementID = element->GetNumberID();
00248     }
00249 
00250     for(int n=0; n<unstructured2d->GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00251     {
00252       clNode2D *sourceNode  = unstructured2d->GetNodePointer(n);
00253 
00254       dMatrix   coord3d = surface->GetCoordinates(sourceNode->x(), sourceNode->y());
00255       clNode3D  newNode(lastNodeID + sourceNode->GetNumberID(), coord3d);
00256 
00257       for(int e=0; e<sourceNode->GetNumberElements(); e++)
00258       {
00259         int elementID = sourceNode->GetElementID(e);
00260         newNode.AddElementID(lastElementID + elementID);
00261       }
00262 
00263       AddNode(newNode);
00264     }
00265 
00266     // Copy elements to surface grid, and update elementIDs on the fly to ensure uniqueness
00267     for(int e=0; e<unstructured2d->GetNumberElements(); e++)
00268     {
00269       clTriangle *sourceElement = unstructured2d->GetElementPointer(e);
00270       clTriangle  newElement((clUnstructured2D*) this, lastElementID + sourceElement->GetNumberID());
00271 
00272       for(int f=0; f<sourceElement->GetNumberFaces(); f++)
00273       {
00274 
00275         int neighbourID = sourceElement->GetNeighbourID(f);
00276         if(neighbourID>=0)
00277         {
00278           newElement.SetNeighbourID(f, lastElementID + neighbourID);
00279         }
00280       }
00281 
00282       for(int n=0; n<sourceElement->GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00283       {
00284         int nodeID = sourceElement->GetNodeID(n);
00285         if(nodeID>=0)
00286         {
00287           newElement.SetNodeID(n, lastNodeID + nodeID);
00288         }
00289       }
00290 
00291       AddElement(newElement);
00292     }
00293   }
00294 
00295   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00296   {
00297     EX.AddMethodToTree("clSurfaceGrid::Copy2dGrid");
00298     throw EX;
00299   }
00300 }
00301 
00302 void clSurfaceGrid::DeleteDuplicateNodes(void)
00303 {
00304   try
00305   {
00306     for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00307     {
00308       clNode3D *masterNode   = GetNodePointer(n);
00309       int       masterNodeID = masterNode->GetNumberID();
00310 
00311       for(int nn=n+1; nn<GetNumberNodes(); nn++)
00312       {
00313         clNode3D *slaveNode   = GetNodePointer(nn);
00314         int       slaveNodeID = slaveNode->GetNumberID();
00315 
00316         double deltaX = fabs(masterNode->x() - slaveNode->x());
00317         double deltaY = fabs(masterNode->y() - slaveNode->y());
00318         double deltaZ = fabs(masterNode->z() - slaveNode->z());
00319 
00320         if(deltaX<PRECISION && deltaY<PRECISION && deltaZ<PRECISION)
00321         {
00322           // Replace references to duplicate node
00323           while(slaveNode->GetNumberElements()>0)
00324           {
00325             int         elementID    = slaveNode->GetElementID(0);
00326             int         elementIndex = GetElementIndex(elementID);
00327             clTriangle *element      = GetElementPointer(elementIndex);
00328             int         nodeIndex    = element->GetNodeIndex(slaveNodeID);
00329 
00330             element->SetNodeID(nodeIndex, masterNodeID); // Replace references to duplicate node
00331             masterNode->AddElementID(elementID);         // Add elementID to node
00332             slaveNode->DeleteElementRefByID(elementID);  // Delete reference to elementID
00333           }
00334 
00335           DeleteNode(slaveNodeID);  // Delete Node
00336           nn--;                     // Reset nn
00337         }
00338       }
00339     }
00340   }
00341 
00342   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00343   {
00344     EX.AddMethodToTree("clSurfaceGrid::DeleteDuplicateNodes");
00345     throw EX;
00346   }
00347 }

00363 void clSurfaceGrid::DumpGrid(const char* fileName)
00364 {
00365   try
00366   {
00367     fstream fout;
00368     fout.open(fileName, ios::out);
00369     fout.precision(3);
00370     if (fout.good())
00371     {
00372       DumpNodes(fout);
00373       DumpElements(fout);
00374       //TODO: DumpAreas, etc.
00375 
00376       fout.close();
00377     }
00378     else
00379     {
00380       throw clExceptionTree("clSurfaceGrid", "DumpGrid", "Could not open dump-file.");
00381     }
00382   }
00383 
00384   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00385   {
00386     EX.AddMethodToTree("clSurfaceGrid::DumpGrid");
00387     throw EX;
00388   }
00389 }
